description.en: Demo configuration containing examples for basic communication, a YouTube player, webradio player, different keyboards and environmental control.
description.de: Demo Konfiguration für einfache Kommunikation, einen YouTube-Player, Webradio-Player, verschiedene Keyboard-Layouts und Umgebungssteuerung.

description.en: Dynamic communicator, developed by the ARASAAC team, with robust vocabulary, and two communication options combined with each other: communicator with core vocabulary distributed by categories and core vocabulary - essential words communicator.
description.es: Comunicador dinámico, elaborado por el equipo de ARASAAC, con vocabulario robusto, y dos opciones de comunicadción combinadas entre sí: comunicador con vocabulario núcleo distribuido por categorías y comunicador tipo core vocabulary – palabras esenciales.

description.en: Dynamic communicator, developed by the ARASAAC team, with robust vocabulary, and two communication options combined with each other: communicator with core vocabulary distributed by categories and core vocabulary - essential words communicator.

Dynamic communicator, developed by the ARASAAC team, with robust vocabulary, and two communication options combined with each other: communicator with core vocabulary distributed by categories and core vocabulary - essential words communicator.
description.de: Dynamischer Kommunikator, ausgearbeitet vom ARASAAC-Team, mit robustem Vokabular und zwei Möglichkeiten der Kommunikation, die miteinander kombinierbar sind: Kommunikator mit Kernvokabular aufgeteilt in Kategorien und Kommunikator vom Typ "Core vocabulary" - essentielle Wörter.
